attributes.action: Change the Laws on ID Scanners
attributes.additional_details: Anybody who has been to any establishment where bouncers almost run the night out will know that they yield far to much power. ID Scanners almost permit this behaviour, look at them wrongly, disagree with them or even falsely accused of an act may cause you to not only be banned from the premises, but, also from other establishments across the country. This is wrong, and must be changed immediately.
attributes.background: I believe Parliament should remove the ability for clubs and pubs to ban an individual from other establishment's that are not their own. Yielding such power over someones life has lead to and will continue to lead to abuse of power.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you'd like the law to be changed.
